items.title: call centers
items.content: I worked in a few call centers only to pay bills and support myself a little.

items.title: remedial teaching
items.content: Just like call centers, support classes had the same goal.

items.title: snack
items.content: I worked (helped in fact) my brother to sell sandwiches, snacks, soup, 'الحرشة' pronounced 'Harsha' sorry , no english word for that but here is the pictures : Link.
